程序包 com.oligei.ticketgathering.dao

接口 ActivityDao

所有已知实现类:
ActivityDaoImpl
public interface ActivityDao

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Activity add​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String actor, java.lang.String timescale, java.lang.String venue, java.lang.String activityicon)
    save an activity with title,actor,timescale,venue,activityIcon
    ActivityNeo4j addActivityNeo4j​(java.lang.String activityId, java.lang.String category, java.lang.String subcategory, java.lang.String city)
    add activity to neo4j
    java.lang.Boolean delete​(java.lang.Integer activityId)
    use activityId to delete the activity
    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> findActivityByCategoryAndCity​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String city)
    use activityId to find activity(no data in mongo)
    java.lang.Integer findMaxActivityId()
    find max activityId
    Activity findOneById​(java.lang.Integer id)
    use activityId to find activity(no data in mongo)
    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> recommendOnContent​(java.lang.Integer userId, java.lang.Integer activityId)
    use userId and activityId to get id of activity that is the same kind of activity and haven't been seen by the user
